main event: A sighting of an oval object the size of a basketball was reported in Fairbanks, Alaska, in July 1956.
interesting points: The object had no discernible features and made no sound., It was silver or metallic in color., The object appeared stationary but may have been moving slowly., The object was observed for 30 minutes before disappearing going straight up at high speed., Weather conditions were fairly clear with no thunder storms in the area at the time of observation.
witness description: Clerks from the Fairbanks Supply Squadron
